name: Ancient Temple Escape
description:
Ludum Dare 36 - Ancient Technology

Synopsis:
You are a famous explorer. While exploring a newly discovered temple from an unknown ancient civilization, you triggered the booby trap. Now you have to try to escape if you want to live to explore another day.

Controls:
Arrows to move.
Spacebar to jump.

Team Info:
Ryst is a 2 person team. This is our first Ludum Dare submission.
